DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect vitamin E prevent incidence contrast induce acute kidney injury ( CI-AKI ) patient undergone coronary angiography .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Vitamin E Preventing Contrast-Induced Acute Kidney Injury Following Coronary Angiography
DOC.criteria: 1 . All patient whon either stable coronary artery disease ( CAD ) recent acute coronary disease ( ACS ) schedule coronary angiography . 2 . Patients eGFR ≤60 ml/min/1.73 m2 1 . Allergy contrast medium 2 . Cardiogenic shock 3 . Pulmonary edema 4 . Overt cardiac failure leave ventricular ejection fraction ≤ 30 % 5 . Acute kidney injury 6 . The history receive contrast medium medical diagnostic therapeutic procedure previous 5 day 7 . The history dialysis 8 . Being pregnant 9 . Having recent acute myocardial infarction 10 . Taking antioxidant nephrotoxic drug include NSAID ACEI previous 2 day
